org.openimaj.hadoop.mapreduce.stage.helper

Class TextLongByteStage

  • java.lang.Object

      • org.openimaj.hadoop.mapreduce.stage.helper.TextSequenceFileStage<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable>
        • org.openimaj.hadoop.mapreduce.stage.helper.TextLongByteStage

  • public abstract class TextLongByteStage
extends TextSequenceFileStage<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable>
    A helper class for a common stage type. In this case, a stage that goes from text to a sequence file of bytes indexed by longs
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
